General.Name: Fujian Dongbai Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Dongbai (Group) Co.,Ltd. engages in the retail and warehousing and logistics business in China. The company engages in the development of commercial real estate assets, including department stores, shopping centers, cultural, commercial and travel complexes, online businesses, etc., as well as leasing of real estate; and development and operation of warehousing logistics facilities. It also owns and operates Dongbaifangxiang hotel that comprises 172 guest rooms, which include deluxe and executive rooms, and suites. In addition, the company provides general cargo warehousing services; and supply chain management services. Fujian Dongbai (Group) Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1957 and is based in Fuzhou, China.
